abilities.name: Measured Strike
abilities.description:
Deal <rt.warning>113% Strength </>damage to target enemy.

Generates  <rt.mana>1 Combo Point</>.

abilities.name: Power Strike
abilities.description:
Deal <rt.warning>142% Strength</> damage to target.

Generates <rt.mana>2 Combo Points</>.

abilities.name: Shield Slam
abilities.description:
Deals <rt.warning>265% Strength</> damage to your target and <rt.warning>26.5% Strength</> damage to other enemies near your target.

<rt.absorb>Shield Slam</> generates <rt.mana>25% Toughness</>.

<rt.mana>TOUGHNESS</>
The higher <rt.mana>Toughness</> you have, the less damage you takes.

abilities.name: Shockwave
abilities.description: Slam sword and shield together creating a shockwave, dealing <rt.warning>471% Strength</> damage and slowing their movement speed by 90%. The slow is reduced by 10% every 1 second for 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Charge
abilities.description: Charge a target enemy, causing <rt.warning>120% Strength</> damage and <rt.absorb>Stunning</> them for 1.5 sec.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: <rt.absorb>Taunt</> the target, forcing it to attack you for 6 sec.

abilities.name: Bash
abilities.description:
<rt.absorb>Interrupt</> the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec. 
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Shield Throw
abilities.description:
Throw your shield at target enemy dealing <rt.warning>207% Strength</> damage. The shield will bounce to up to 4 additional nearby enemies.

Generates <rt.mana>1 Combo Point</> per target hit.

abilities.name: Shields Up
abilities.description:
Raise your shield, increasing your <rt.mana>Toughness</> by 65% and increasing your chance to <rt.bold>Block</> direct attacks by 25% for 8 sec. Generates <rt.mana>Toughness</> based on your Strength.

<rt.mana>TOUGHNESS</>
The higher <rt.mana>Toughness</> you have, the less damage Helena takes.

abilities.name: Banner of Hope
abilities.description: Increase all party members <rt.absorb>Maximum Health</> by <rt.heal>20%</> for 15 sec.

abilities.name: Leader's Conviction
abilities.description:
You gain 100% <rt.mana>Toughness</> and it does not get reduced by damage for the next 12 sec. While <rt.absorb>Leader's Conviction</> is active, all damage you deal is increased by 15%.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Battle Command
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.

Nearby allies gain 25% Movement Speed.

abilities.name: Chain Pull
abilities.description: Throw a chained spearhead at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>100% Strength</> damage and pulling them to you.

abilities.name: Sweeping Strike
abilities.description:
Deals <rt.warning>133% Strength</> damage to your target and other nearby enemies.

Enemies hit by <rt.absorb>Sweeping Strike</> bleed for <rt.warning>135% Strength</> damage over 18 seconds.

abilities.name: Iron Wall
abilities.description: Your <rt.mana>Toughness</> can not be reduced for 8 seconds.

abilities.name: Leader's Conviction
abilities.description:
You gain 100% <rt.mana>Toughness</> and it does not get reduced by damage for the next 12 sec. While <rt.absorb>Leader's Conviction</> is active, all damage you deal is increased by 15%.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.</>

name: Helena
description:
Despite being weighed down by full plate armor, Helena is always ready to charge into the fray and protect her companions from harm.

Helena utilizes a mechanic called ‘Toughness’ which reduces the amount of damage she takes in battle. Toughness is indicated as a shield above her action bar and is affected by her shield abilities

Helena utilizes a mechanic called 'Combo Points.' Combo Points are gained by the basic attack abilities, which in turn can be spent to use more powerful abilities. Helena's current combo points are indicated by the blue orbs above her shield representing Toughness.

talents.name: The Best Defense
talents.description:
Each time you <bold>Block</> an attack with your shield, you have a chance to reset the cooldown of <bold>Shield Throw</> and increase the damage of your next Shield Throw by 30%.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Threat Generation</> is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Shield Mastery
talents.description:
The cooldown of your <bold>Shields Up</> And <bold>Shield Throw</> abilities are reduced relative to the amount of damage you mitigate with <bold>Toughness</>.

<bold>Passive:</> Your chance to <bold>Block</> is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Sword & Board
talents.description:
Your <bold>Power Strike</> has a chance to make your next <bold>Shield Slam</> generate additional Toughness and have no combo points cost.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Power Strike</> and <bold>Shield Slam</> deal 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Aftershock
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your <bold>Shockwave</> ability deal 8% reduced damage for 9 seconds.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Shockwave</> cooldown is reduced by 10%

talents.name: Skull Cracker
talents.description:
Your <bold>Shield Throw</> deals 100% increased damage to the first target it hits.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Shield Throw's</> Critical Strike chance is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Front Line Defender
talents.description:
The efficiency of your <bold>Toughness</> mechanic is increased by 15%.

<bold>Passive:</> Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Second Wind
talents.description:
When your <bold>Toughness</> has reduced an amount of damage equal to 30% of your Maximum Health, you gain 20% increased Strength for 12 sec.

<bold>Passive:</> You take 10% less Magic damage.

talents.name: Greater Shockwave
talents.description:
Enemies that take damage from your <bold>Shockwave</> are stunned for 2 seconds.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Shockwave</> deals 65% increased damage.

talents.name: Gleaming Shield
talents.description:
While <bold>Shields up</> is active your <bold>Shield Slam</> deals 40% increased damage and all healing effects on you are increased by 20%.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Armor</> is increased by 15%.

title: Warmaster
lore: The commander and sole survivor of her troop, Helena swore long ago that as long as she still breathes, no soldier under her command will ever fall in battle. Helena is a stern presence within the Fellowship, maintaining a seasoned warrior’s discipline. She uses both the shield she wields to protect others, and to distance herself becoming too familiar with her companions, lest she suffer the burden of loss again.

abilities.name: Prickly Vine
abilities.description: Summon a <rt.absorb>Prickly Vine</> to continously fling thorns at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>93% Intellect</> damage per attack. Lasts 27 seconds.

abilities.name: Nettlebolt
abilities.description: Cast a bolt of nettles at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>90% Intellect</> damage to them.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Heal
abilities.description:
Assign one of your <rt.meikoability1>Pink Flutterflies</> to an ally, healing them for <rt.heal>46% Intellect</> every 3 seconds until it is called away.

All healing done by <rt.absorb>Fluttercall: Heal</> counts as <rt.meikoability1>Flutterfly Healing</>.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Restore Life
abilities.description:
Beckon two <rt.meikoability1>Pink Flutterflies</> to dance around target ally, healing them for <rt.heal>186% Intellect</> after 2 seconds and an additional <rt.heal>490% Intellect</> over 14 seconds.

All healing done by <rt.absorb>Fluttercall: Restore Life</> counts as <rt.meikoability1>Flutterfly Healing</>.

abilities.name: Heart Bloom
abilities.description:
Conjure a <rt.absorb>Heart Bloom</> at your side that stores 30% of all <rt.meikoability1>Flutterfly healing</> you do inside it.

Every 3 seconds, the <rt.absorb>Heart Bloom</> releases a pulse, healing all allies within 4000 radius for an amount equal to the healing it has stored. Lasts 9 seconds.

abilities.name: Cure Ailment
abilities.description: Remove all <rt.debuff>Harmful</> <rt.bold>Magic Effects</> from target ally.

abilities.name: Life Petal
abilities.description:
A <rt.absorb>Life Petal</> sprouts up near you, healing one ally for <rt.heal>142% Intellect</> every 1 second over 10 seconds, preferring the ally with the lowest health.

<rt.absorb>Nettle to the Petal</>
The cooldown of <rt.absorb>Life Petal</> is reduced by 3 seconds each time you cast <rt.absorb>Nettlebolt</>.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Protect
abilities.description:
Send your <rt.mana>Blue Flutterfly</> to protect target ally.

While your <rt.mana>Blue Flutterfly</> is attached to an ally, all <rt.meikoability1>Flutterfly Healing</> done to them is increased by 300%.

<rt.absorb>Blue Flutterfly</>
Your expertise stat affects this ability.

abilities.name: Hidden Trail
abilities.description:
Your Movement Speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.

<rt.absorb>Demure</>
Upon activating <rt.absorb>Hidden Trail</> your threat is reduced by 20% with all enemies.

abilities.name: Bark Skin
abilities.description: Target ally takes <rt.absorb>20% reduced damage</> for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Shroomsplosion
abilities.description:
Command all mature <rt.absorb>Boomshrooms</> to attack causing them to leap at target enemy and explode, each dealing <rt.warning>113% Intellect</> damage to all enemies within a radius.


<rt.absorb>Boomshrooms</>
Each time one of your plants expire, budding <rt.absorb>Boomshrooms</> start growing in that location. After 12 seconds, the <rt.absorb>Boomshroom</> has reached full maturity and is ready to be called into battle.

abilities.name: Thornbush Blossom
abilities.description: Place a <rt.absorb>Thornbush Blossom</> in target location. For the next 12 seconds, all allies standing in the radius of the Blossom take <rt.absorb>20% reduced damage</>.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Jubilee
abilities.description:
You send out <rt.absorb>Dream Flutterflies</> to protect all allies by evenly distributing all health between them every 3 seconds over 6 sec.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Rootsap Revival
abilities.description: Command each active <rt.absorb>Prickly Vine</> to aid target ally, healing them for <rt.heal>259% intellect</> over 3 seconds.

abilities.name: Soothing Touch
abilities.description: Heal target ally for <rt.heal>518% Intellect</>.

abilities.name: Vicious Spores
abilities.description: Conjure dangerous spores to assault the target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>656% Intellect</> damage over 18 sec.

abilities.name: Fluttercall: Embrace
abilities.description:
Recall your <rt.mana>Blue Flutterfly</> to you.

While the <rt.mana>Blue Flutterfly</> is on you, all <rt.meikoability1>Flutterfly Healing</> you do is increased by 100% and the mana cost of your abilities are reduced by 15%.

<rt.absorb>Blue Flutterfly</>
Your expertise stat affects this ability.

abilities.name: Life Petal: Yellow Flutterfly
abilities.description: Heals you every 2 sec, for 16 sec.

name: Sylvie
description:
Sylvie is a healer who uses her innate connection to nature and its many friends to empower her magic.

Sylvie utilizes her Flutterflies to conduct Flutterfly Healing. Sylvie is joined by 4 Pink and 1 Blue Flutterflies. She can assign these Flutterflies to her fellows with her abilities to heal them and/or increase healing received.

talents.name: Nettle to the Petal
talents.description:
The cooldown of your Life Petal is reduced by 2 seconds each time you deal damage with Nettlebolt and 4 seconds if it critically strikes.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your healing is increased by 15% on players with 30% or less health.

talents.name: Synchronized Fluttering
talents.description:
Hold down <bold>Fluttercall: Heal</> for 2 seconds to cast the ability on up to 4 allies within 4000 range in one cast. The mana cost is increased by 200% when cast in this way.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your <bold>Fluttercall: Heal</> ticks 100% faster for the first 6 seconds each time it begins healing a player.

talents.name: Symbiosis
talents.description:
Your <bold>Fluttercall: Restore Life's</> healing is increased by 8% for each <bold>Prickly Vine</> you have active.

<bold>Passive:</>
The duration of your <bold>Fluttercall: Restore Life</> is increased by 3 seconds.

talents.name: Sprouting Nettles
talents.description:
Each tick of <bold>Flutterfly Healing</> has a chance to make your next <bold>Nettlebolt</> Instant Cast and have 100% Critical Strike chance.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your <bold>Nettlebolt</> deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Elusive Wildling
talents.description:
You take 20% reduced damage while <bold>Hidden Trail</> is active.

<bold>Passive:</>
You take 10% less Area of effect damage

talents.name: Bluey's Gambit
talents.description:
While your <bold>Blue Flutterfly</> is following you, your movement speed is increased by 10%.

While your <bold>Blue Flutterfly</> is following another player, they take 3% reduced damage.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Movement Speed</> is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Bursting Petals
talents.description:
Your <bold>Life Petal's</> healing is front loaded, healing for twice as much on the the first tick and ramping down with each tick thereafter.

<bold>Passive:</> The healing of your <bold>Life Petal</>, <bold>Heartbloom</>, and <bold>Rootsap Revival</> is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Flower Power
talents.description:
<bold>Heart Bloom</> has 2 charges.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your <bold>Heart Bloom's</> mana cost is reduced by 30%.

talents.name: Bloomin' Boomshrooms
talents.description:
Upon detonation, each <bold>Shroomsplosion</> heals nearby allies for 150% Intellect.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your <bold>Shroomsplosion</> deals 20% increased damage

title: Child of the Forest
lore:
Abandoned at a young age, Sylvie was taken in and raised by the forest itself. She spent her childhood under the protection of its boughs and learning the natural cycles of magic from her friends, the Flutterflies.

As she grew, so did her curiosity about what was beyond the edges of the Forest. Deciding she has come of age and wishing to know more about where she came from, she has set off with her friends to explore Endring.

abilities.name: Ice Dash
abilities.description: Quickly travel forward a short distance.

abilities.name: Frost Ward
abilities.description: You take <rt.absorb>40% reduced damage</> for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Brain Freeze
abilities.description:
<rt.absorb>Interrupt</> the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec. 
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Frigid Winds
abilities.description: Blast enemies in front of you with arctic winds, <rt.absorb>Knocking Back</> enemies and <rt.absorb>Slowing</> them by 50% for 12 sec.

abilities.name: Wrath of Winter
abilities.description:
Invoke the spirits of the frozen tundra, causing you to passively cast a volley of <rt.absorb>Anima Spikes</> at enemies and generate <rt.mana>1 Winter Orb</> every 2 seconds. Lasts 20 seconds.

You deal <rt.warning>15% increased damage</> while <rt.absorb>Wrath of Winter</> is active.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Ice Comet
abilities.description: Unleash a large <rt.absorb>Ice Comet</> from above at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>322% Intellect</> damage to all enemies caught in the impact radius.

abilities.name: Cold Snap
abilities.description:
Assault the target with extreme cold, dealing <rt.warning>189% Intellect</> damage.

Generates <rt.mana>1 Winter Orb</>

abilities.name: Ice Blitz
abilities.description:
You enter a state of focused casting for 20 seconds, causing each <rt.mana>Anima</> you generate to instantly shoot out an <rt.absorb>Anima Spike</> at your target.

You deal <rt.warning>15% increased damage</> while <rt.absorb>Ice Blitz</> is active.

abilities.name: Dance of Swallows
abilities.description:
Summon a flock of swallows that circle above target enemy for 20 seconds. Your <rt.absorb>Cold Snap</> and <rt.absorb>Freezing Torrent</> will command the Ice Swallows to swoop down on enemies dealing <rt.warning>57% Intellect</> per hit.

Ice Swallows benefit from and trigger all effects that <rt.absorb>Anima Spikes</> do.

abilities.name: Winter's Blessing
abilities.description: Your <rt.absorb>Spirit</> is increased by 20% for 12 seconds and all damage you deal is replicated as <rt.heal>healing</> divided equally between all allies.

abilities.name: Glacial Blast
abilities.description: Hurl a a mass of ice at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>542% Intellect</> damage.

abilities.name: Frost Bolt
abilities.description:
Hurl a bolt of water and frost at target enemy, dealing <rt.warning>73% Intellect </> damage.

Generates 3 <rt.mana>Anima</>

abilities.name: Freezing Torrent
abilities.description:
Flay your target with a beam of frost energy, dealing <rt.warning>324% Intellect</> damage over 2 seconds while channeling.

Generates <rt.mana>1 Anima</> per tick up to <rt.mana>6 Anima</> when fully channeled.

abilities.name: Bursting Ice
abilities.description:
Conjures an icy crystal inside a target that periodically erupts, dealing <rt.warning>330% Intellect</> damage to the target and nearby enemies over 3 seconds.

<rt.absorb>Bursting Ice</> generates <rt.mana>1 Anima</> per enemy hit up to a maximum of <rt.mana>3 Anima</> each tick.

name: Rime
description:
Rime is a ranged caster that draws from the Anima within her soul and the elements around her to damage her opponents. She utilizes these powers in two forms: Anima and Winter Orbs.

Many of Rime's basic abilities channel a form of Anima which fills up her Anima Bar. When this bar is filled the Anima coalesces into Winter Orbs. As a result of this coalescing, the remaining Anima is sent as Anima Spikes at nearby engaged enemies.

Winter Orbs are represented by the orbs on Rime's interface above the Anima Bar; these Orbs are spent to empower Rime's more powerful elemental abilities.

talents.name: Chillblain
talents.description:
Your <bold>Freezing Torrent</> deals 20% of its damage each tick to up to 5 additional enemies near the target.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Freezing Torrent</> deals 20% increased damage.

talents.name: Coalescing Ice
talents.description:
When <bold>Bursting Ice</> deals damage to a single target it generates 2 additional Anima.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Bursting Ice</> damage is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Glacial Assault
talents.description:
Your <bold>Coldsnap</> ability causes you to gain 1 stack of <bold>Glacial Assault</> up to a maximum of 5 stacks.

<bold>Glacial Assault</> causes your next <bold>Glacial Blast</> to be instant cast and deal 10% inceased damage per stack of <bold>Glacial Assault</> consumed.

<bold>Passive:</> Your <bold>Glacial Blast</> has 10% increased Critical Strike chance.

talents.name: Unrelenting Ice
talents.description:
Each tick of <bold>Freezing Torrent</> reduces the cooldown of <bold>Bursting Ice</> by 0.5 seconds.

<bold>Passive:</> You take 10% less Area of Effect damage.

talents.name: Icy Flow
talents.description:
Each of your <bold>Anime Spike</> hits reduce the cooldown of <bold>Freezing Torrent</> by 0.2 seconds.

<bold>Passive:</> Your Movement Speed is increased by 10%.

talents.name: Avalanche
talents.description:
<bold>Ice Comet</> has a 50% chance to strike twice, and a 8% chance to strike three times.

<bold>Passive:</> Your Critical Strike Power is increased by 5%.

title: n/a
lore:
Hailing from the far and frozen north of Endring, Rime's upbringing instilled a healthy respect for the elemental forces around her. Her people spend their lives among the snow and ice and seek warmth and comfort in their traditions and the blessings of their tribal spirits.

Blessed or maybe cursed by the spirits of the land, Rime was given the the ability to manipulate the flows of Anima around her. A skill that her tribe thought lost to their past. She uses this ability to manipulate the water and ice around her, teaching her enemies to respect the elemental forces.

name: Quetzal
description: As Quetzal strikes with his Talon Daggers, he's sometimes visited by his fallen bretheren, spirits appearing in the form of birds. These spirit birds assist the feathered assassin as he flips and swoops around, playing with his prey.
title: The Feathered Assassin

abilities.name: Dawnflare
abilities.description:
Deals <rt.warning>90% Intellect</> damage to target enemy and generates <rt.mana>Rune Power</>.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour can call upon the light to unleash a flare of divine light from above. This flash of radiant energy strikes the enemy with a sharp but controlled force.</>

abilities.name: Radiant Blast
abilities.description:
Within a cone in front of you, allies are healed for <rt.heal>87% Intellect</> and enemies take <rt.warning>113% Intellect</> damage.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour expells an explosive flash of divine light from his outstretched hand, healing allies in its path, while searing enemies with its blinding brilliance.</>

abilities.name: Heal
abilities.description:
Heal target ally for <rt.heal>691% Intellect</>.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour opens his sacred tome, drawing forth radiant power inscribed within its pages. With a solemn gesture, he calls forth a burst of healing energy to mend even the deepest wounds.</>

abilities.name: Circle of Light
abilities.description:
Place a <rt.bold>Circle of Light</> on the ground, instantly healing all allies within its radius for <rt.heal>487% Intellect</>.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour calls upon the power of light to create a circle of divine healing on the ground. Allies within its boundaries are restored in a sudden flash, as the light pours into them, mending their wounds.</>

abilities.name: Dawnbreaker Orb
abilities.description:
Conjure an orb of light that slowly travels forward, healing all allies it touches for <rt.heal>310% Intellect</> and damaging enemies for <rt.warning>265% Intellect</>.

Each ally and enemy touched by <rt.absorb>Dawnbreaker Orb</> generates a small amount of <rt.mana>Rune Power</>.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour conjures an orb of intricate runes, humming with radiant power. The orb shines brilliantly as it slowly drifts forward, burning all darkness from its path and bolstering the lifeforce of Vigour's allies.</>

abilities.name: Remove Magic
abilities.description: Remove all <rt.debuff>Harmful</> <rt.bold>Magic Effects</> from target ally.

abilities.name: Soulbrand
abilities.description:
Deal <rt.warning>594% Intellect</> damage over 24 sec to target enemy.

Rune of Woe generates <rt.mana>1 Radiant Rune</> over its duration.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour inscribes a searing rune onto the soul of his enemy, infusing it with radiant energy. The rune pulses painfully, steadily draining their life force while fueling Vigour’s power.</>

abilities.name: Rune of Renewal
abilities.description:
Instantly heal target ally for <rt.heal>594% Intellect</> and apply Rune of Renewal on them for 24 seconds, causing all your direct healing effects on that ally to echo for an additonal <rt.heal>25% of the initial heal's value</>.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour inscribes a resonating rune onto the spirit of an ally. When Vigor heals that ally, the rune pulses gently, further mending any wounds that linger as its light nourishes the body and spirit.</>

abilities.name: Luminous Barrier
abilities.description:
Apply a shield to target ally that absorbs up to <rt.heal>1175% Intellect</> damage while it persists. The shield lasts for 8 sec.

<rt.greyitalic>Vigour inscribes a rune of protection onto an ally, causing light to be woven around them into a barrier of divine energy. The barrier stops all forms of attack, whether forged by steel or conjured by magic.</>

abilities.name: Lightshaper's Ward
abilities.description: Target ally takes <rt.absorb>20% reduced damage</> for 12 seconds.

abilities.name: Runic Proliferation
abilities.description: Instantly generate <rt.mana>3 Radiant Runes</>. For the next 8 seconds, any <rt.absorb>Rune Abilities</> you cast are empowered, increasing their effectiveness by 20%.

abilities.name: Levitate
abilities.description:
Your movement speed is increased by 50% for 6 seconds.

<rt.absorb>Levitation</>
You take 20% reduced Area of Effect damage while levitating.

abilities.name: Avatar of Light
abilities.description:
Instantly heal all allies within a large radius of you for <rt.heal>280% Intellect</> and enter an enlightened state for 9 sec, enhancing your abilities.

<rt.absorb>Radiant Blast</>
Deals <rt.warning>50% increased damage</> and has no <bold>Cooldown</>.

<rt.absorb>Heal</>
Costs <rt.mana>50% less Mana</> and is <rt.bold>Instant Cast</>.

<rt.absorb>Circle of Light</>
Costs <rt.mana>50% less Mana</> and has no <bold>Cooldown</>.


<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste and 400% Mana Regeneration for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Throw Book
abilities.description: Punish a target, <rt.absorb>Stunning</> them for 2 sec.

name: Vigour

talents.name: Epiphany
talents.description:
Your <bold>Dawnflare</>, <bold>Soulbrand</> & <bold>Radiant Blast</> have a 15% chance to make your next <bold>Heal</> instant cast and cost 50% less Mana.

Epiphany stacks up to 3 times.

<bold>Passive:</> 
Your Condemn deals 10% increased damage.

talents.name: Enduring Light
talents.description:
The healing of your <bold>Circle of Light</> is increased by up to 50% depending on the amount of health the target is missing. Lower health gives a larger bonus.

<bold>Passive:</> 
Your <bold>Circle of Light's</> mana cost is reduced by 25%.

talents.name: Ruptured Soul
talents.description:
When an enemy dies while <bold>Soulbrand</> is active on them you instantly gain 50% of the <bold>Rune Power</> it would have generated in the time that was remaining and trigger an explosion dealing 50% of the damage that was remaining to all nearby enemies.

<bold>Passive:</> 
Your <bold>Soulbrand</> deals 15% increased damage.

talents.name: Beacon in the Dark
talents.description:
Each time <bold>Soulbrand</> deals damage you have a chance to reset the cooldown of <bold>Radiant Blast</> and make your next <bold>Radiant Blast</> have 100% critical strike chance.

<bold>Passive:</> 
Your <bold>Radiant Blast</> healing is increased by 20%.

talents.name: Sacred Barrier
talents.description:
Allies under the effects of <bold>Luminous Barrier</> take 5% reduced damage.

<bold>Passive:</> 
You take 10% reduced damage from Area of Effect attacks.

talents.name: Expansive Mind
talents.description:
Your <bold>Dawnflare</> casts have a chance to grant you <bold>Expansive Mind</>, increasing your expertise by 10% for 16 seconds and replenishing 8% of your mana over the duration..

<bold>Passive:</>
Your maximum mana is increased by 5%.

talents.name: Master of Triage
talents.description:
Each time you fill a Rune resource, a free Greater Heal of 50% efficiency is cast on a nearby ally, prefering the player with lowest health.

<bold>Passive:</>
Greater Heal has 0.5s reduced cast time

talents.name: Meticulous Runesmith
talents.description:
Runesphere cost reduced by 1 Rune.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your Runesphere healing and damage is increased by 30%

talents.name: Grand Design
talents.description:
Your Single Target Rune abilities can now be held down to charge them up. For every 1 second you charge them, they will spend another Rune and apply to another target up to 4.

<bold>Passive:</>
Your Rune of Woe, Rune of Mending & Rune of Protection have 20% increased duration.

title: Rune Priest
lore:
Born into a lineage of devoted priests who worshipped the primordial forces of light, Vigour exhibited a unique connection to the light from an early age—one far beyond that of his peers. However, Vigour had little interest in the life his elders envisioned for him: a life spent locked away in secluded monasteries, surrounded by books and murals, experiencing the world solely through the eyes of others. Instead, he chose a path of exploration, traveling across the lands, seeing the world with his own eyes, and creating his own stories. During his travels, he immersed himself in the study of ancient rune carvings that spoke of the fabled Light-Bringers—beings said to have woven the very fabric of creation with their radiant power.

On one of his journeys, Vigour stumbled upon an dusty tome that set him on the path toward his destiny. Within its pages lay the secrets of the Radiant Runes—describing an ancient discipline for binding light itself in order to wield it as an extension of one's will.

Through his eventual mastery of the Radiant Runes, Vigour now taps into the very essence of light with ease—a power he uses to defend those in need from the many forms of darkness that seek to corrupt the world. His sacred duty is not only to heal the wounded but also to strike down those who would use shadows to harm the innocent. It is said that the light he calls forth is both a gift of life and a harbinger of divine wrath, as those who stand in his way are met with the full force of his radiant judgment.

abilities.name: Become Human
abilities.description: You will gain an absorb shield with 15% of your Max Health, and all movement impairing effects will be removed.

abilities.name: Heavy Strike
abilities.description:
Your next <rt.absorb>Auto Attack</> deals 240% increased damage.

<rt.absorb>Thunder Call</>

Swing your hammer in a wide arc toward target enemy dealing <rt.warning>62% Strength</> damage them and any nearby enemies.

<rt.absorb>Recklessness</>
- Enemies have an increased chance to <rt.bold>Dodge</> Wild Swing.
- Wild Swing cannot Critically Strike.
- Damage of Wild Swing is increased by an amount equal to your Critical Strike chance percentage.

<rt.mana>Generates Fury relative to damage dealt</>

abilities.name: Face Breaker

Instantly attack target enemy dealing <rt.warning>275% Strength</> damage.

Face Breaker can only be used after one of your attacks <rt.bold>Misses</> or is <rt.bold>Dodged</> by an enemy.

<rt.mana>Generates Fury relative to damage dealt</>

abilities.name: Skull Crusher
abilities.description:
Instantly deal <rt.warning>340% Strength</> damage to target enemy.

<rt.absorb>Thunder Call</>
Skull Crusher beckons a thunder bolt to strike the target from above, dealing <rt.warning>272% Strength</> damage.

abilities.name: Hammer Storm
abilities.description:

Hammer Storm has an initial cost of <rt.mana>26 Fury</>, and an additional <rt.mana>8 Fury</> every 0.7 seconds until you have spent a maximum of <rt.mana>50 Fury</> per use.

<rt.absorb>Thunder Call</>
Hammer Storm causes lightning to strike you as you spin, shocking enemies hit for an additional <rt.warning>45% Strength</> damage every 0.7 seconds.

<rt.mana>Generates 25 Fury</>

Chain Lightning does not deal damage to you.

<rt.absorb>Execution</>
Can only be used against enemies that have 30% or less health.

Damage dealt to <rt.absorb>Intimidated</> enemies may break the effect.

abilities.name: Focused Wrath
abilities.description: Your next two casts of <rt.absorb>Skull Crusher</> or <rt.absorb>Hammer Storm</> cost <rt.mana>50% less Fury</> and deal 30% increased damage.

abilities.name: Raging Tempest
abilities.description:
You gain an enhanced version of <rt.absorb>Thunder Call</> for 20 seconds.

<rt.absorb>Raging Curents</>
In addition to it's normal effects, <rt.absorb>Raging Currents</> strike a random nearby enemy every 0.5 seconds dealing <rt.warning>66% Strength</> lightning damage. Each time <rt.absorb>Raging Currents</> hits an enemy your Critical Strike chance is increased by 1.5%, stacking up to 20 times.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Unbreakable Will
abilities.description:
You take <rt.absorb>30% reduced damage</> for 6 seconds and then <rt.absorb>20% reduced damage</> for an additional 4 seconds.

While active, your Unbreakable Will ability is replaced by <rt.absorb>Taunt</>.

<rt.absorb>Taunt</>
Forces target enemy to attack you for 6 seconds.

abilities.name: Taunt
abilities.description: Taunt target enemy, forcing it to attack you for 6 seconds.

name: Tariq
description:
Tariq is a melee damage dealer, who utilizes slow continual auto-attacks, timed between reactions and ability swings. These attacks can be charged with abilities such as Heavy Strike to deal more damage and generate Fury.

Tariq utilizes a mechanic called ‘Fury.’ Fury is a resource by Tariq's empowered auto attacks which allows him to call upon heavy damage dealing abilities such as Chain Lightning and Thunder Call.

Overall Tariq is a steady DPS whose timing based abilities allow him to burst damage periodically throughout the fight.

title: Guardian of Amari
lore:
Tariq is a giant of a man, strong of hand and stronger of heart. He lived a simple life of calm and peace, but one fateful day, his partner and child were lost in the wars of the Clans.

He took their bodies and climbed the sacred mountain to enact their burial rights. Over their pyres to the sky, Tariq's stoic demeanor crumbled and his temper let loose as he raged in fury. He beseeched the sky for the strength to give his fury meaning and protect those below.

When he descended from the mountain everyone in the Clan could tell he was a changed man. The atmosphere around him was electric, and there was lightning in his eyes. A new strength powered his swings and when he embraced the rising fury, those around him could see the physical manifestation of the tempest of his soul.

title: The Demon of Brimborn Falls
lore: Brimborn is a demon and cultist hunting half-demon who have gained his powers in the demon realm, by staying there for too long, and by a symbiotic entity that has possessed his arms. He fires demonic magic out of his two living guns that grow out from his arms.

Any direct damage Racket deals while within the radius will cause the Drum to beat with a small delay (0.2-0.4 second delay-ish. tweakable)

30 second cooldown, activates upon bringing drum Back

Red Hand causes the target to take 15% of the damage Big Smack dealt every 2 seconds over 8 seconds. (Note: The Damage over Time ticks do not trigger the Drum to beat)

abilities.name: Fighting Techniques
abilities.description:
Grants access to <rt.mana>Finishing Moves</>  based on <rt.mana>Combo Builders</> used:

<rt.meikoability1>PALM TECHNIQUES</> 
<rt.meikoability1>Spirited Strikes</> 
• Grants <rt.bold>+20% Haste</> & <rt.bold>+5% Parry</> for 15 sec.
<rt.meikoability1>Spirited Vortex</> 
• Conjures a Vortex around you that provides <rt.bold>+5% Dodge</> and deals damage to nearby enemies over 18 sec.

<rt.meikoability2>KICK TECHNIQUES</> 
<rt.meikoability2>Rising Storm</> 
• Deals damage to the target and grants <rt.bold>2 Stormfall</> charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Lashing Stormkicks by 100%.
<rt.meikoability2>Lashing Stormkick</> 
• Deals damage to target and nearby enemies nearby. Heals you for 50% of the damage it deals.

<rt.meikoability3>FIST TECHNIQUES</> 
<rt.meikoability3>Rising Earth</> 
• Deals damage to the target and grants <rt.bold>2 Earthfall</> charges, increasing the damage of your next 2 Earthfist Barrages by 100%.
<rt.meikoability3>Earthfist Barrage</> 
• Pummels target enemy over 2 seconds and heals you for 50% of the damage it deals.

abilities.name: Taunt

<rt.absorb>Interrupt</> the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec. 
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Shatter Earth
abilities.description: Leap and slam the ground at a target location, dealing <rt.warning>207% Agility</> damage to all enemies in the area and leaving an area of quaking earth that deals <rt.warning>184% Agility</> damage over 6 seconds to any enemy standing in in the effect.

abilities.name: Stone Shield
abilities.description:
Summon 3 protective stones around you that spin in a wide circle, dealing <rt.warning>160% Agility</> damage to all nearby enemies.

Each stone <rt.bold>increases armor by 25%, up to a maximum of 75%</>.

While at least one is active, the stones <rt.bold>mitigate 30% of all damage you take</>. When the stones have mitigated <rt.heal>800% Agility</>, one of the stones will break.

abilities.name: Cyclone
abilities.description: Create a <rt.absorb>Cyclone</> of strong winds that instantly pulls in all enemies within the radius to you.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Bulwark
abilities.description:
Split your soul into the <rt.meikoability2>Sibling of Wind</> and the <rt.meikoability3>Sibling of Earth</> for up to 20 seconds.

<rt.meikoability2>SIBLING OF WIND (controlled)</>
The Sibling of Wind takes 20% of any damage dealt to the Sibling of Earth..

<rt.meikoability3>SIBLING OF EARTH</>
The Sibling of Earth taunts all enemies in a 1000 radius around them every 1.5 seconds. If the Sibling of Earth is destroyed before the duration ends, <rt.absorb>Twin Souls: Bulwark</> ends.

abilities.name: Serenity
abilities.description:
Instantly heal yourself for <rt.heal>140%</> Agility.

Your <rt.bold>Auto Attacks</> and <rt.absorb>Tage Kachi: Sanbo</> hits increase the healing of <rt.absorb>Serenity</> by 30%, stacking up to 50 times.

abilities.name: Stone Stomp
abilities.description: Send a shockwave through the ground in front of you, dealing <rt.warning>119% Agility</> damage to enemies in its wake and <rt.absorb>Stunning</> them for 3 sec.

abilities.name: Twin Souls: Army of One
abilities.description:
You split your soul into the <rt.meikoability2>Sibling of Wind</> and the <rt.meikoability3>Sibling of Earth</> for X seconds.

<rt.meikoability3>SIBLING OF EARTH (controlled)</>
While <rt.absorb>Twin Souls: Army of One</> is active, the Sibling of Earth takes <rt.absorb>40% reduced damage</>.

<rt.meikoability2>SIBLING OF WIND</>
The Sibling of Wind swiftly teleports to, and strikes, nearby enemies up to 32 times dealing <rt.warning>92% agility</> damage with each strike.

<rt.absorb>SPIRIT ABILITY</>
<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb>Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 seconds.</>

abilities.name: Rising Storm
abilities.description:
Perform a powerful jump kick, dealing <rt.warning>50% Agility</> damage to your target and nearby enemies. Damage is reduced beyond 3 targets. Grants you 2 charges of <rt.mana>Stormfall</>.

<rt.absorb>Stormfall</>
Your next <rt.bold>Lashing Stormkick</> deals 100% increased damage.

Lashing Stormkick heals you for 200% of the damage it deals.

<rt.absorb>Stormfall</>
Using Lashing Stormkick will consume 1 <rt.mana>Stormfall</> and increase its damage by 100%.

abilities.name: Rising Earth
abilities.description:

<rt.absorb>Earthfall</>
Your next <rt.bold>Earthfist Barrage</> deals 100% increased damage.

abilities.name: Double Palm Strike
abilities.description:

<rt.absorb>SPIRITED STRIKES</>
+20% Haste
+5% Parry

abilities.name: Earthfist Barrage

Earthfist Barrage heals you for 100% of the damage it deals.

<rt.absorb>Affected by Earthfall</>
Using <rt.bold>Earthfist Barrage</> will consume 1 <rt.absorb>Earthfall</> and increase its damage by 100%.

abilities.name: Spirited Vortex

talents.description:
Enemies hit by Spirited Vortex have 20% reduced Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

<bold>Passive:</>
Spirited Vortex damage increased by 10%

title: The Fighter
lore:
Meiko was sent to vanquish an unspeakable evil to make her people safe. She was strong, she was ready, but it all went wrong. She battled for what seemed like an eternity, but before she delivered the final blow the evil vanished in a blaze of smoke, it was an illusion, a trick!

As the wind blew away the disguise, the smell of ash and a distant fire reached Meiko and her heart sank. While she was fighting the illusion, the evil had laid waste to her city and its people.

The evil had destroyed her home and her purpose, now only she remains. Meiko cannot undo what has happened to her people, but she can avenge them. That will be her purpose now.

abilities.name: Searing Blaze
abilities.description:
Target enemy burns for <rt.warning>372% Intellect</> damage over 24 seconds.

Each tick of <rt.bold>Searing Blaze</> has a 10% chance to generate 5 <rt.mana>Embers</>.

abilities.name: Fire Ball
abilities.description:
Throw a ball of fiery devestation at the targeted area, dealing <rt.warning>430% Intellect</> direct damage to all enemies in the radius and setting them on fire, dealing an additional <rt.warning>132% Intellect</> damage to them over 9 sec.

Each Tick of <rt.bold>Fire Ball's</> damage over time effect has a 25% chance to generate 15 <rt.mana>Embers</>.

abilities.name: Wildfire
abilities.description: All your active Fire Damage over Time effects flare up instantly, causing them to <rt.bold>tick 30% faster for 9 sec</>.

abilities.name: Fireflash
abilities.description:
<rt.absorb>Interrupt</> the target's spellcasting and prevent it from casting for 4 sec. 
Must interrupt a spell, or it will have no effect.

abilities.name: Flickerstep
abilities.description: Instantly teleport forward a short distance.

abilities.name: Flame Ward
abilities.description: You take <rt.absorb>40% reduced damage</> for 4 seconds.

abilities.name: Pyromania
abilities.description: Instantly duplicates target enemy's DoT effects from Ardeos Abilities, and applies them to up to 5 enemies within X radius of target enemy.

abilities.name: Scorch
abilities.description: Target Enemy becomes disoriented for 12 seconds

abilities.name: Engulfing Flames
abilities.description:
Engulf your target in flames, dealing <rt.warning>496% Intellect</> damage over 24 sec.

Each tick of <rt.bold>Engulfing Flames</> has a 20% chance to generate 10 <rt.mana>Embers</>.

abilities.name: Detonate
abilities.description: Instantly detonate all your Fire Damage over Time effects on enemies, dealing damage equal to 4 seconds of ticking damage to each enemy.

abilities.name: Inferno Bolt
abilities.description:
Throw a fiery bolt at target enemy dealing <rt.warning>145% Intellect</> damage to it.

Generates 45 <rt.mana>Embers</>.

abilities.name: Incinerate
abilities.description:
A jet of fire erupts from your hands that deals a total of <rt.warning>730% Intellect</> damage to all enemies hit over 4.5 seconds and applies a stacking Damage over Time on them dealing <rt.warning>300% Intellect</> damage over 12 sec, increased by 10% for each stack that is applied.

Incinerate generates 40 <rt.warning>Embers</> for every 0.5 sec it is channeled.

<rt.greyitalic>When you activate your Spirit ability you gain </><rt.absorb> Spirit of Heroism</><rt.greyitalic>, granting +30% Haste for 20 sec.</>

abilities.name: Fire Frogs
abilities.description:
Conjure three <rt.absorb>Fire Frogs</> to leap at your enemies dealing <rt.warning>89% Intellect</> instant damage and burning them for an additional <rt.warning>19% Intellect</> every 3 seconds over 12 seconds. The damage over time effect can stack up to 9 times per target.

Each Fire Frog will perform 3 attacks before dissipating.

abilities.name: Apocalypse
abilities.description:
Conjure a major eruption of fire in the targeted area, dealing <rt.warning>1573% Intellect</> damage to all enemies in a large radius.

<rt.absorb>Apocalypse's</> cooldown is reduced by 10 seconds each time you cast <rt.absorb>Detonate</>.

name: Ardeos
description:
Ardeos is a cocky ranged spellcaster who utilizes powerful Fire Damage over Time effects. The fact that others have struggled to utilize such raw power doesn’t concern him, he’s found it to be a snap!

Ardeos utilizes a system called Embers and Burning Embers. When he uses his basic abilities he collects the remaining Embers of the spellcast. When enough Embers have been collected they are set ablaze as Burning Embers. These Burning Embers are visible as the flames over Ardeos’ action bar.

The Burning Embers can be spent to cast Detonate, causing your Fire Damage over Time effects to deal instant damage.

talents.name: Agonizing Blaze
talents.description:
Each tick of Searing Blaze on a target increases the damage it deals by 3% up to a maximum of 30% increased damage at 10 stacks.

All stacks are lost when Searing Blaze is removed from the target.

talents.name: Improved Inferno Bolt
talents.description: Inferno Bolt deals 20% increased damage for each of your Damage over Time effects that is active on the target, up to 80% increased damage.

talents.name: Firestarter
talents.description: Inferno Bolt has a chance to trigger a free cast of Wildfire for 6 seconds.

talents.name: Reign of Fire
talents.description: Detonate has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown of Apocalypse.

talents.name: Fiery Omen
talents.description: When you cast Apocalypse, your next 3 Inferno Bolts casts deal 200% increased damage. Lasts 20 sec.

talents.name: Frog Squad
talents.description:
Your <bold>Fire Frogs</> ability conjures 2 additional frogs.

<bold>Passive:</> Your Fire Frogs deal 50% increased damage over time.

talents.name: Rolling Flames
talents.description:
You gain Rolling Flames each time you cast <bold>Detonate</>.

Rolling Flames causes your next <bold>Engulfing Flames</> to be instant cast and apply <bold>Searing Blaze</> to the target.

You can have up to 5 stacks up Rolling Flames at any one time.

<bold>Passive:</> The duration of your <bold>Engulfing Flames</> is increased by 3 seconds.

title: Firemage
lore: Ardeos chose his own name from a book of powerful wizards from a long previous age of Endring. The old wizard wasn’t using it, they were long dead and Ardeos needed it more. It's been a long time since a Wizard has been named in Endring and it's clear that no-one is prepared, least of all Ardeos. But that’s okay, Ardeos doesn’t need to have a plan, they’ve not built a prison that can hold him yet and it's likely to stay that way as his power grows.

name: Helena
description:
Despite being weighed down by full plate armor, Helena is always ready to charge into the fray and protect her companions from harm.

Helena utilizes a mechanic called ‘Toughness’ which reduces the amount of damage she takes in battle. Toughness is indicated as a shield above her action bar and is affected by her shield abilities

Helena utilizes a mechanic called 'Combo Points.' Combo Points are gained by the basic attack abilities, which in turn can be spent to use more powerful abilities. Helena's current combo points are indicated by the blue orbs above her shield representing Toughness.
title: Warmaster
lore: The commander and sole survivor of her troop, Helena swore long ago that as long as she still breathes, no soldier under her command will ever fall in battle. Helena is a stern presence within the Fellowship, maintaining a seasoned warrior’s discipline. She uses both the shield she wields to protect others, and to distance herself becoming too familiar with her companions, lest she suffer the burden of loss again.
